attributes.action: Ensure that Bailliff's can no l;onger use arrogance, intimidation and false representation of their powers, that theyeir fees be strictly limited, and that their powers be limited when dealing with old, disabled, and poor, including those on Benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My opinion on the governments intention to increase the powers of bailiffs to enter homes without a court warrant is a serious mistake. Bailiffs alreay abuse their powers. Thay can be arrogant, offensive, and intimidating particularly to vulnerable people such as disabled, aged, single parents. My suggestion is that their powers be curbed and to prevent them taking goods which are not the property of the debtor without the bailliffs themselves finding proof to the contrary.
